dmca.title: UNIVERSAL NOTIFICATION TO CEASE AND DESIST (URL/IP) @ http://www.darinoos.net
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: WorldSims.org Legal Department [mailto:legal@worldsims.org] 
Sent: Monday, April 18, 2005 9:16 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com
Subject: UNIVERSAL NOTIFICATION TO CEASE AND DESIST (URL/IP) @
http://www.darinoos.net

UNIVERSAL NOTIFICATION TO CEASE AND DESIST DATED 18 April 2005

FROM:
WORLDSIMS.ORG, LLC. LEGAL DEPARTMENT
WORLDSIMS.ORG
P.O. BOX 93375
CITY OF INDUSTRY, CA 91715
U.S.A.

RE: DARINOOS.NET


We are the legal department for WORLDSIMS.ORG, LLC., a website located at
http://www.worldsims.org.

This site is utilising bandwith paid by my client and I request the total
removal of all links to my client's site.



URL and/or IP address of identified source: http://www.darinoos.net

The page(s) of the infringement are located at:
http://www.darinoos.net/postt1912.html
http://www.darinoos.net/postx1912-0-15.html
http://www.darinoos.net/postx1912-0-30.html


DMCA Compliant ISP:

In accordance with the provisions the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of
1998

Please expeditiously "take down" or "block access" to the infringing
material and take appropriate action against the customer to prevent future
abuse.

Non DMCA Compliant ISP:   
        
In accordance with your Acceptable Use Police please expeditiously remove or
block access to the infringing materials and take appropriate action against
the customer to prevent future abuse.



Declaration

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY, that I am an agent 
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain property rights, said 
owners being named:

WORLDSIMS.ORG

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not 
authorized by the above property owners, their agents, or the law and
therefore 
infringe their rights. 

-Bandwith Consumption

I further aver that the information contained in the Notice above is
accurate.

Your cooperation and assistance in this matter would be most appreciated. 

Confirmation of your actions is appreciated so we may appraise out client.



Regards,
WORLDSIMS.ORG, LLC. LEGAL DEPARTMENT
WORLDSIMS.ORG, LLC.
http://www.worldsims.org

--

http://www.squadmail.com
